page.title: 03The RAILWAY STATION.
page.content: THE RAILWAY AND THE STATION. Since 1945 heavy industry}has{declined in{Kenilworth.}The{nature of the town particularly since the{1960's}has {become principally residential}with {some light industry}such as micro-electronics but with more {emphasis}on{commercial interests}such as{banking}and related businesses. The {"Beeching Axe"}of{1963}saw the beginning of{the end}for{rail {passenger traffic}-{the station}being {closed down in 1965}and, very sadly for those{concerned}about{conservation and{preservation of historic {buildings,}was finally{demolished}in its centenary year!{The site}is now used mainly as a{builders merchant's yard{and}a new but{small housing {development}has absorbed the remainder of the original station site.
